item.title: Competitive Steak Eating and Gender
item.description: Before we get too far down the trail on this, I’ll warn readers that this is a pink and blue post. It’s simple prediction using an interesting R package. It’s important to consider the stakes (pun intended), when “enriching” a dataset with information that might introduce bias. Here, inaccuracies can occur by simple misspelling or just a slightly higher probability for the years selected…or other things. That said, I wanted to get an idea of gender diversity in competitive steak eating competition.
